scripts.build: npm run pre && ng build --configuration prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build && swa deploy dist/browser --app-name stapp-personal --env prod
scripts.pre: mkdir -p src/assets/docs && typst compile assets-gen/resume.typ src/assets/docs/bruno-roque-resume.pdf && node assets-gen/main.js
scripts.start: npm run pre && ng serve --configuration dev
scripts.watch: npm run pre && ng build --watch --configuration dev
